webToMarkdown.heroTitle:
The ultimate
data refining tool for RAG
webToMarkdown.heroSub: Drop the noisy HTML. Convert any webpage into clean, LLM-friendly Markdown in 1 second.
webToMarkdown.featDesc: Providing an overwhelming pipeline experience to boost LLM performance.
webToMarkdown.feat1Desc: Automatically filters out ads, footers, navigation bars, and noisy elements intelligently to extract pure body content.
webToMarkdown.feat2Desc: Perfectly converts all relative paths and image sources to absolute URLs, preventing context and reference House errors in LLMs.
webToMarkdown.feat3Desc: Achieves extreme parsing speed utilizing Cheerio instead of heavy browsers that consume excess resources. Drastically cuts computing costs.
webToMarkdown.compDesc: A chaotic DOM tree reborn as refined Markdown knowledge.
webToMarkdown.priceTitle: Build your AI pipeline with unbeatable efficiency
webToMarkdown.priceDesc: Forget opaque pricing. Pay only for what you use, at some of the lowest rates in the industry.
webToMarkdown.diveDesc: How did I build this RAG-Ready API?
